title: QT5.15.2 +webkit+opengl concretize bug with python versions

labels.name: fixed-by-new-concretizer
labels.description: An issue that is resolved by the ASP-based concretizer

body:
All,
I've encountered a concretize error when the starting off a new spack repo and doing an install of qt+webkit+opengl.

**Reproduce the error**
1.  Start off with fresh spack repo
2. Use gcc/9.3.0 or other compiler (doubt this is an issue here)
3. Create an environment --without-view
4. spack install qt+webkit+opengl

**Result of error**
```
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    python@2.7.18%gcc@9.3.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@9.3.0~debug~pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
            ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^expat
        ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
            ^readline@8.1%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
                ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@9.3.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
                    ^pkgconf@1.7.4%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^gettext@0.21%gcc@9.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
            ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@9.3.0~python arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
                ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@9.3.0~pic arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@9.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
            ^tar@1.34%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^libffi@3.3%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^openssl@1.1.1k%gcc@9.3.0~docs+systemcerts arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
            ^perl@5.32.1%gcc@9.3.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
                ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@9.3.0+cxx~docs+stl arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^sqlite@3.35.4%gcc@9.3.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
        ^util-linux-uuid@2.36.2%gcc@9.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    meson@0.49.2:
```
**Spack Debug report**
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2515-9a3513b3ec
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** original

**More Details**
Looks like this references PR https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/22928
